thread.title: Preity Zinta finally talks about dating her husband Gene Goodenough! | Zee News
thread.title_full: Preity Zinta finally talks about dating her husband Gene Goodenough! | Zee News

title: Preity Zinta finally talks about dating her husband Gene Goodenough! | Zee News
text:
Preity Zinta finally talks about dating her husband Gene Goodenough! By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 18:02 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: Well, Bollywood actress Preity Zinta made sure that no one knew about her dating life before getting hitched. Even her wedding turned out to be a hush-hush affair. However, she later hosted a grand and glittery reception for her B-Town buddies. 
But, in the beginning, she kept her romantic life away from her fans as well. 
Recently, the 42-year-old actress spilled the beans on how she met her husband Gene Goodenough. According to a MissMalini report, originally attributed to her Facebook Live session, she said, “I met him in Santa Monica in Los Angeles about six years ago. Then we dated for five years and we finally got married.” 
The duo tied the knot last year. MUST READ 
Preity is gearing up for her upcoming film ‘Bhaiyyaji Superhitt’. The flick also features Sunny Deol and Ameesha Patel in the prominent roles. First Published: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 18:02 More from zeenews
